column4: Hey guys i am having some serious problems getting ubuntu 8, working with dual monitors 22" lcd and 14" crt.  using a radeon 3450 hd card. i tried the fglrx driver via aticonfig etc but it doesn't work can anyone point me in the right direction ?

Hey guys i am having some serious problems getting ubuntu 8, working with dual monitors 22" lcd and 14" crt.  using a radeon 3450 hd card. i tried the fglrx driver via aticonfig etc but it doesn't work can anyone point me in the right direction ?
how do i setup dual monitors with an ati card under ubuntu 8.04 ?
you'll need a bat wing, an onion, and the blood of a calf... then you'll need luck
